title: paahi parama dhayaaLO
sahitya: pAhi parama dayALO harE mAmanupallavi sundarAnana mukunda rAghava purandarAdi nuta manda rAgadharacaraNam 1 pankajApta hariNAnga nayana shritAnga suguNa makarAnga janaka mAm   caraNam 2 krUra mAnava radhAri bhavyakara nIradAbha su-sharIra mA ramaNa   caraNam 3 nirvikAra guNa sarvaradhara pUrva dEva mada garva bhanjana   caraNam 4 pUrNa rUpakalashArNa vastita suparNa vAhana su-varNa cEla mAm   caraNam 5 rakSamAmanica makSarAmrta rAkSasa nirjara su-pakSa cApadhara   caraNam 6 ranganAyaka shubhAnga sUryakula pungavAri mada bhanga sarvada   caraNam 7 nAga shayana bhavarOOga nAsha krpa rAgadE varada tyAgarAjanuta
